about.title: About Our Store
about.descriptionTitle: Message Perfumes and Oud , is a company specializing in oud and perfume products. This brand was created by an oud lover, ensuring specialization and expertise.
about.description: Our motto is honesty and quality, which confirms its commitment to providing high-quality products. The company pledges to provide distinguished customer service to ensure customer satisfaction. This is to provide assistance and leadership in choosing the most effective methods.

contact.description: If you're making great products or looking to collaborate with us, don't hesitate to reach out.

refundPlice.description: We strive to provide our customers with the highest quality oud and perfumes. However, we understand that there may be instances where a refund is necessary. Please take a moment to review our refund policy for oud and perfumes:

ELIGIBILITY.sub1: Refunds will only be considered for unopened and unused oud and perfume products.
ELIGIBILITY.sub2: The original proof of purchase, such as a receipt or invoice, is required for all refund requests.

TIMEFRAME.sub1: Refund requests must be made within 14 days from the date of purchase.
TIMEFRAME.sub2: After the 14-day period, we are unable to process any refund requests.

NON-REFUNDABLE-ITEMS.sub1: Due to hygiene reasons, opened or used oud and perfume products cannot be refunded.
NON-REFUNDABLE-ITEMS.sub2: Gift cards or vouchers issued by Message Oud are non-refundable and cannot be exchanged for cash.

STORE-CREDIT.sub1: In certain cases where a refund is not possible, we may offer store credit as an alternative.
STORE-CREDIT.sub2: Store credit can be used for future purchases at Message Oud and will be issued in the form of a gift card or voucher.

terms.title: TERMS OF SERVICE
terms.general-modification: We reserve the right to modify or update these terms at any time without prior notice. You are responsible for reviewing the terms periodically. Your continued use of our store after any modifications constitutes acceptance of those changes.
terms.usage-productInformation: We strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information about our products, including descriptions, prices, and availability.
terms.usage-purchases: By making a purchase through our store, you agree to provide accurate, complete, and current information. You are solely responsible for the accuracy of the information provided. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order if we suspect fraudulent activity or for any other reason deemed necessary.
terms.usage-pricing: All prices displayed on our store are in the specified currency and are subject to change without notice. We make every effort to ensure accurate pricing, but in the event of an error, we reserve the right to correct it and refuse or cancel any affected orders.
terms.usage-availability: Product availability is subject to change without notice. We make every effort to maintain accurate stock levels, but we cannot guarantee the availability of any product. If a product becomes unavailable after you place an order, we will notify you and provide alternatives or a refund.
terms.shipping-shipping: We offer shipping services to specified locations. Shipping fees and estimated delivery times are provided during the checkout process. Please review our shipping policy for more information.
terms.shipping-customs: International orders may be subject to customs fees, import duties, and taxes imposed by the destination country. These charges are the responsibility of the recipient. We recommend checking with your local customs office for more information before placing an international order.
terms.shipping-delivery: We will make reasonable efforts to deliver your purchased products within the specified timeframe. However, delivery times are estimates and are subject to various factors beyond our control. We are not liable for any delays or damages arising from the delivery process.
terms.shipping-returns: We accept returns or exchanges of unused, unopened products within a specified period, subject to our Return Policy. You are responsible for any return shipping costs unless the return is due to our error or a defective product. We reserve the right to refuse returns or exchanges based on our discretion.
terms.usage-oud-testing: We recommend testing perfumes and oud products on a small area of skin before applying them widely to ensure compatibility and to check for any allergic reactions. We are not responsible for any adverse reactions resulting from the use of our products.
terms.usage-oud-variations: Oud and perfume products may vary in scent, color, and packaging due to natural variations and manufacturing processes. We strive to provide accurate representations of our products, but such variations are normal and do not constitute defects.
terms.intellectualProperty-ownership: All content and materials on our store, including text, graphics, logos, images, product descriptions, and trademarks, are the property of their respective owners, including us. You are not granted any rights or licenses to use our intellectual property without our prior written consent.
terms.limitation-disclaimer: Our store is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee that our store will be error-free, uninterrupted, or free from viruses or other harmful components. You use our store at your own risk.
terms.limitation-limitation: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or special damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our store, including but not limited to damages for loss of profits, goodwill, data, or other intangible losses.
terms.endNote: Thank you for reviewing our Terms and Conditions. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us for further assistance.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: We are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our customers' personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect the information you provide while using our website or interacting with us. By accessing our website or providing your personal information, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect:
content: Contact information (such as name, email address, phone number, and shipping address).
Payment information (such as credit card details or other payment method information).
Account login credentials (if you create an account with us).
Demographic information (such as age, gender, and preferences) provided voluntarily.
Information related to your purchases, browsing behavior, and interactions with our website.

useOfPersonalInformation.title: Use of Personal Information:
content: Process and fulfill your orders, including shipping and delivery.
Provide customer support and respond to your inquiries, requests, or comments.
Customize and improve your shopping experience.
Send you promotional offers, newsletters, or other marketing communications (you can opt-out at any time).
Conduct research and analysis to enhance our products, services, and website.
Comply with legal obligations and prevent fraudulent activities.

sharingInformation.title: Sharing of Personal Information:
content: Service Providers: We may engage trusted third-party service providers to perform certain functions on our behalf, such as payment processing, shipping, or marketing.
Legal Compliance: We may disclose personal information to comply with applicable laws, regulations, legal processes, or enforceable governmental requests.
Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of our business assets, personal information may be transferred as part of the transaction.

security.title: Data Security:
security.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure...

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies:
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience...

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Websites:
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services...

children.title: Children's Privacy:
children.content: Our website and services are not intended for individuals under the age of 16...

rights.title: Your Rights:
rights.content: You have the right to access, update, and correct your personal information...

changes.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy:
changes.content: We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time...

contact.title: Contact Us:
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy...

privacyPolicy.consent: By using our website or providing your personal information, you signify your consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

help.title: Help & Support
help.resetPassword: How do I reset my password ?
help.resetPasswordAnswer: You can reset your password by clicking on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. Follow the instructions sent to your email to create a new password.
help.newBrand: How do I add a new brand?
help.newBrandAnswer: To add a new brand, navigate to the Brands page and click on the 'Add New Brand' button. Fill in the required information in the form and submit.
help.exportDataAnswer: Yes, you can export your data in various formats including CSV, Excel, and PDF from most pages that display tabular data. Look for the export button in the table header.
help.updateProfile: How do I update my profile information?
help.updateProfileAnswer: You can update your profile information by navigating to the Profile page from the dropdown menu in the top-right corner. Edit your information and click 'Save Changes'.
help.inviteNewUser: How can I invite new users to the platform?
help.inviteNewUserAnswer: Administrators can invite new users from the Settings > Users page. Click on 'Invite User' and enter their email address and role.

contactSupport.title: Contact Support
contactSupport.subtitle: Need additional help? Our support team is available to assist you.
